title: Killing spiritual mages

properties.name: description
properties.value: The profit rate assumes 180 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.

content:
Killing spiritual mages
Requirements
Skills
  • 83
  • 70+ , , recommended
  • 70 recommended
  • 43+ recommended
Items
  • Proselyte armour and a high-level weapon
  • Zamorak and Saradomin protection (e.g. God book and cape)
  • Super attack/strength or a Super combat potion (optional)
  • A Super restore
  • Several Prayer potions
  • Some food
  • A Rope if it is your first time going to GWD
  • Holy wrench (optional)
  • An emergency teleport (optional)
    • Quest
    Partial completion of Troll Stronghold - must have defeated Dad
    Other
    • Eadgar's Ruse and 61 for Trollheim Teleport (optional)
    Results
    ProfitExperience gained
    313,303 57,600 19,199 13,500
    Inputs (100,150)Outputs (413,453)
    10 × Prayer potion(4) (100,150)1.41 × Dragon boots (242,269)190 × Astral rune (23,924)169 × Death rune (31,725)347 × Nature rune (60,451)42.19 × Law rune (5,484)197 × Mud rune (29,540)169 × Mist rune (18,734)2.81 × Gem drop table (1,325)
    Getting to the God Wars Dungeon.
    Saradomin's Encampment sits south-east of the dungeon entrance.

    The profit rate assumes 180 kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.

    Spiritual mages commonly drop nature runes (174 coins each). They also commonly drop low-end runes, but their most valuable drop is Dragon boots at 1/128. If players want to wait while their damaged stats replenish or wish to conserve supplies, they may kill the Saradominist mages engaged in combat in the central area.

    The best location to fight spiritual mages is the first room of Saradomin's Encampment. The mages in this area are quite often distracted attacking the Werewolf, saving you the need for Protect from Magic. This requires level 70 Agility AND A ROPE. If not available, then the spiritual mages just outside of K'ril Tsutsaroth's room are a good second choice.

    Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
    It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
    All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
    To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
    If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.

'''The profit rate assumes {{#var:kph}} kills per hour. Your actual profits may be higher or lower depending on your speed and luck.'''

[[Spiritual mage]]s commonly drop [[nature runes]] ({{GEP|Nature rune}} coins each). They also commonly drop low-end [[runes]], but their most valuable drop is [[Dragon boots]] at 1/128. If players want to wait while their damaged stats replenish or wish to conserve supplies, they may kill the Saradominist mages engaged in [[combat]] in the central area.

The best location to fight spiritual mages is the first room of [[Saradomin's Encampment]]. The mages in this area are quite often distracted attacking the [[Werewolf]], saving you the need for [[Protect from Magic]]. This requires level 70 [[Agility]] AND A ROPE. If not available, then the spiritual mages just outside of [[K'ril Tsutsaroth]]'s [[Zamorak's Fortress|room]] are a good second choice.
